add_library(tpce_utilities OBJECT
            DateTime.cpp
            EGenVersion.cpp
            Money.cpp
            Random.cpp
            condition.cpp
            error.cpp
            locking.cpp
            threading.cpp)
set(TPCE_OBJECT_FILES
    ${TPCE_OBJECT_FILES} $<TARGET_OBJECTS:tpce_utilities>
    PARENT_SCOPE)
set_target_properties(
  tpce_utilities
  PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS
    "-Wno-unused-private-field -Wno-exceptions -Wno-unused-const-variable")
